example.parse: (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يعتبر) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM اللاجئون)) (S (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC برامج) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الاونروا))) (PP-PRD (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مثابة) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_INDEF_GEN ضمان) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاسرة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولية))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S-NOM-TPC-2 (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC مطلب) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ايجاد) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حل)) (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN شامل) (CONJ و) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN عادل)))))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لم)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J يصبح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC طي) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النسيان))))))))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: that their demand for a just and comprehensive solution has not been forgotten.

example.arg: ان مطلبهم ايجاد حل شامل وعادل لم يصبح طي النسيان
